CHECK COMMON FOR CONTROLS

order of filters:

Buffer A:
- chromatic aberration
- RGB grain
- vignette
- rounded corners

Buffer B:
- 7x4 pixelation
- hex offset
- 7x4 sub-pixel RGB mask

Image:
- bloom
- barrel-distortion

#define aberration_amount 0.07
#define noise_amount 0.7
#define vignette_amount 0.7
#define rounded_amount 0.07

#define pixelate_amount .7
#define mask_amount .7

#define bloom_amount .7
#define distortion_amount 0.07

#define self_buf iChannel0
#define map1 map_uint_0
#define map2 map_uint_1

#define mapmap1 map_map_uint_0
#define mapmap2 map_map_uint_1
const ivec2 mapmap_reg = ivec2(0,34);

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    ivec2 ipx = ivec2(fragCoord);
    
    if(ipx==ivec2(32,32)){
        fragColor = vec4(1.,map1.length(),map2.length(),0.);
        return;
    }
    
    if(ipx.x>=32||ipx.y>=32){
        if(ipx.y!=mapmap_reg.y||((ipx.y==mapmap_reg.y)&&ipx.x>=mapmap1.length())){
            fragColor = vec4(0.,0.,0.,0.);
            return;
        }
    }
    
    bool reset = texelFetch(self_buf, ivec2(32,32),0).x<0.5;
    vec4 self_col = texelFetch(self_buf, ipx,0);
    
    if(iFrame>0&&!reset) {
        fragColor = self_col;
        return;
    }
    
    if((ipx.y==mapmap_reg.y)&&ipx.x<mapmap1.length()){
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap1[ipx.x]);
        fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap2[ipx.x]);
    }else{
        int idx_x = ipx.x+ipx.y*int(32);
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        if(idx_x<map1.length())
            fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(map1[idx_x]);
        if(idx_x<map2.length())
            fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(map2[idx_x]);
    }
    
}

        fragColor = self_col;
        return;
    }
    
    if((ipx.y==mapmap_reg.y)&&ipx.x<mapmap1.length()){
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap1[ipx.x]);
        fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap2[ipx.x]);
    }else{
        int idx_x = ipx.x+ipx.y*int(32);
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        if(idx_x<map1.length())
            fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(map1[idx_x]);
        if(idx_x<map2.length())
            fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(map2[idx_x]);
    }
    
}

        return;
    }
    
    if(ipx.x>=32||ipx.y>=32){
        if(ipx.y!=mapmap_reg.y||((ipx.y==mapmap_reg.y)&&ipx.x>=mapmap1.length())){
            fragColor = vec4(0.,0.,0.,0.);
            return;
        }
    }
    
    bool reset = texelFetch(self_buf, ivec2(32,32),0).x<0.5;
    vec4 self_col = texelFetch(self_buf, ipx,0);
    
    if(iFrame>0&&!reset) {
        fragColor = self_col;
        return;
    }
    
    if((ipx.y==mapmap_reg.y)&&ipx.x<mapmap1.length()){
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap1[ipx.x]);
        fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(mapmap2[ipx.x]);
    }else{
        int idx_x = ipx.x+ipx.y*int(32);
        fragColor = vec4(0.);
        if(idx_x<map1.length())
            fragColor.x = uintBitsToFloat(map1[idx_x]);
        if(idx_x<map2.length())
            fragColor.y = uintBitsToFloat(map2[idx_x]);
    }
    
}
